text.text: Great! Here are some things I can do for you.

üîê *Securely collaborate with care teams* 
 Create private patient channels to access data and exchange information with the rest of the care team.

*üñ•  Optimize clinical workflows* 
 Automate intake and discharge workflows, document management, referrals, and handoffs to efficiently manage patient care.

*‚úÖ  Stay up-to-date with care plans tasks* 
 Keep care plans and tasks updated using simple commands, task status is synced automatically to Health Cloud.

*üîî Set up critical care alerts* 
 Push notifications to the care team including critical device alerts and lab results from the EMR.
What would you like to do first?
